title: [WELLNESS] Ep. 225 Everything You Didn't Know About Wine: Pros, Cons + What to Look Out For with Todd White
description:
Get your own copy of Ashley’s new book You Turn at youturnbook.com!

 

Do you know what the ingredients of your favorite wine or cocktail are?

 

This week, Ash sits down with the CEO and founder of Dry Farm Wines, Todd White to discuss drinking consciously. Todd is here to share insight into the wine industry, what is happening to you when you consume alcohol and how to enjoy a drink while being conscious of your health. Cheers! 🍷

 

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. What biohacking is, and how it influences our health.
  2. Two main causes of chronic disease and natural ways to reduce your risk.
  3. The impact of agriculture on wine, laws that impact alcohol, and the truth behind the alcohol industry.
  4. Beneficial properties of red wine (polyphenols). 
  5. The 3 components that make wine natural.



Dry Farm Wines:

Get an extra bottle in your first box for basically, FREE (a penny because it’s alcohol, it can’t be free).  

See all the details and collect your wine at dryfarmwines.com/youturn 

 

BIOPTIMIZER

 

Is your immune system in need of a pick-me-up? 

Visit biomebreakthrough.com/youturn and use code YOUTURN at checkout for 10% off your order.

Here is something just for you to sleep more deeply, reduce stress and heal anxiety.

Visit ashleystahl.com/soul and use the code YOUTURN at checkout for 15% off your order!

Click on this exclusive link to automatically get a $25 credit applied to your account AND get a 14-day FREE trial.
